entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Mary's Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:21 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 27 except minus 31 inland.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27 except minus 31 inland. Wind chill minus 30 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Snow beginning near noon. Blowing snow over exposed areas late in the afternoon. Amount 5 cm except 10 cm south of Port Hope Simpson. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023
